title: Such a Good Girl
description: Riley Stone is just about perfect.(Ask anyone.)She has a crush on her French teacher, Alex Belrose.(And she suspects he likes her, too.)Riley has her entire life planned out.(The plan is nonnegotiable.)She's never had a secret she couldn't keep.(Not ever.)Riley is sure that her life is on the right track.(And nothing will change that.)She's nothing like a regular teenager.(But she doesn't have any problem admitting that.)Riley doesn't usually play games.(But when she does, she always wins.)She thinks a game is about to start....But Riley always has a plan....And she always wins.
author: Amanda K. Morgan
